content: find the free version of this pattern on my blog click the link this pattern has been professionally edited and it the pdf download includes pictures and lots of crochet charts to follow along the written pattern there is also a step-by-step video tutorial transform your summer wardrobe with this cute and versatile crochet pattern for a stunning summer top available in six sizes xs s m l xl xxl this pattern ensures a perfect fit for everyone simply follow the specific instructions for your size or if you prefer you can also adjust the pattern to your body following the adjustment notes on the pattern light lacy and airy the bluebell top is perfect for breezy warm days this versatile and eye-catching crochet blouse pairs beautifully with cutoff shorts capris skirts or even layered over long sleeve shirts in colder months any dk or sport weight yarn can be used however i highly recommend using natural fibers such as bamboo silk cotton or linen as they provide a lovely drape that compliments the flouncy sleeves and trim along the bottom of the top the construction of this design is simple work it in two panels front and back then join them together the sleeves are worked directly into the top and a beautiful ruffle bottom edge with a picot trim neckline adds the perfect finishing touch ☑ skill level beginner with experienced reading patterns ☑ sizing this pattern is written is 6 sizes as follow xs s m l xl xxl to fit bust sizes 71-76 81-86 91 5- 97 101 5-107 111 5-117 122-127 cm ☑ language pattern is written in american terms ☑there are pictures included in the pattern to help with the tricky part ☑this top is made in dk yarn here s the materials i ve used any dk weight yarn i used hobbii acacia dk 250 m per 100gr ball 51% acrylic 49% cotton
